value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|*sigh*$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Father!$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It's today, isn't it... Were you able to
find a way to dispel Hel's curse in
time?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|No. I have no excuse for what has
befallen me.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Do not apologize, my son. We knew
this day would come. There is no
escaping death.$k$pAlfonse... Stay close to me today.
Keep your allies close, too.$k$pWhen the curse comes due, I expect
Hel to appear and pluck the life
from your paralyzed body herself...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Giving us a chance to strike.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|No. You cannot kill Death. Even if we
attack her then, she will not fall.$k$pHowever, we may catch a glimpse of
something... A weakness, perhaps,
that will lead to her downfall.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I understand. I will do as you
command, Father.$k$pEven though I die, it may not be for
nothing. I hope so, anyway.$k$pI am sure you will defeat her, Father,
or perhaps $Nu.$k$pI will hold fast to that hope.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Your ally from another world?$k$pWe must rely on ourselves, not on
power from beyond Askr. Hel came
to us from another realm...$k$pContact with other realms merely
opens up new avenues to misfortune.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I understand your words, Father. Yet
I have formed a strong bond with
$Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I say again—there is nothing to be
gained by meddling in other realms.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Father...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Heh.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Is something amusing?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah! I'm sorry.$k$pI'm just reflecting on something
Mother told me. She said that, in
your youth, you were much like me.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Did she, now?$k$pI must admit it. Wet behind the ears,
I was. Weapon in hand, I traveled the
realms, always ready to battle...$k$pI was no different than you, it is true.
Yet look at me now, lecturing you...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You misunderstand me, Father. I
was happy to hear that I put Mother
in mind of you.$k$pAs for your concern and your
guidance...they mean everything
to me.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|*sigh*$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Today is the day I will die. I have
failed in my duty as your successor.
That is my deepest regret.$k$pYet to be able to speak so frankly
with you here and now...I am
overjoyed.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|For this battle, we'll stay close to
Askr's main forces. This will be a
fierce fight. Be careful.$k$pWe must do everything we can to
find Hel. We can't allow Alfonse to
die at her hand!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The enemy has been crushed, yet
Hel eludes us.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She's nowhere to be seen, and time
is so short...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_05,0|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah, yes...$k$pThe appointed time has arrived.$k$p$EFace|Death is nearly here.$k$p

$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Mortal...$k$pNow is the time for your life to end.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Hel!$k$p*gasp* I... I can't...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|There is no escape. So many have
tried so desperately...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I won't let you take my brother!$k$p$EFace_Pain|What is this?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Our attacks aren't having any effect.
Is she an illusion? A specter?$k$pWe need to find a way—$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Your efforts and your breath—they
are both wasted.$k$pDeath is the one true absolute.$k$pYour time has come. My scythe is
ready.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Argh...$k$pI'm sorry, $Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Now.$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo1000,255,0,0,255|$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1000|Gah!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Father?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|You...shielded him.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I understand your curse, Hel—it is a
curse on the blood of Askr. That
lesson, I learned from my father.$k$pI am Askran royalty, and it is my life
that will be added to the numbers
of the dead.$k$pThe conditions of your curse are
fulfilled. Depart this place, death god.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Father?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Fool. Look at you, awash in
sentimentality... What has it
cost you?$k$pYou have no right to call yourself a
king.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face|You comprehend nothing.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|What?$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|My life exists only for the people of
this land. I have never lost sight of
that.$k$pSince the day I lost my father...I
swore never to forget my duty.$k$pHow much longer would I have lived?
My son is young, and he is certainly
worthy.$k$pAs king, what choice did I have?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|So you think this princeling has the
makings of a king...$k$pThen die without regret. As ruler of
the dead, I declare your life at an end.$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo1000,255,0,0,255|$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1000|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|No!$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face|Alfonse...$k$pBecome a king, my son.$k$p$Sbs1000|$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo2000,255,0,0,255|
